entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Welland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Welland-Pelham 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: SW 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High 8.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low zero.

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
